MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: ms.assetid: 15BAB25C-DA8C-4F13-9B8F-EA9E4270BCE9 title: Use the light sensor description: Learn how to use the ambient light sensor to detect changes in lighting.

_lightsensor = LightSensor.GetDefault(); // Get the default light sensor object
